R個Dr.個難度有幾高？
research我真係唔擅長
Taught Master GPA 3.3
psy果邊

睇唔到有咩significant
Psy 要係社福上位
你一係就ep cp
一係就轉做sw ot
純粹psy or psy phd 可以令你做到咩？
或者你話你做counseling
咁counseling 都係講經驗多過講個學位

易d搶Ngo某d黑暗位 易d轉出去教育界
好多都係遊走社福教育識人儲CV最後搵合伙人自己開
其實暫時唔會考慮，只係想知R個Dr.個難度有幾高再諗

如果係香港
你可以揀part time
但你要有老細收你
你本身唔係做開research 所以你個network 應該窄d
你可以試下approach 下睇下有冇人收你做學生
一係你就要轉做ra
相對上易小小
再唔係就讀d 俾錢就有既學位， 例如野雞學校既mba
應該有focus ngo
如果你要做intensive 既research 就難小小


如果你要名校，咁你probably 要離開industry 一段時間
你講到要養家，我估你都無辦法

我係法國 啲數好深

巴打讀數？巴黎？

讀data science 係under Applied Math 係巴黎

巴黎d治安係咪真係咁差
其實歐、美、亞數學系文化風格有咩分別？

美: 非top 30會9 fing


有時聽人話top 20, 有時又top 30

你地講緊係subject rank定general rank

general rank講黎做乜鳩
講general rank rutgers會收皮架喎


我覺得無top 10 PhD其實都晒時間，全世界年年世界咁多PhD，真係爭條毛。連top 10都入唔到，姐係未夠料，不如打工好過，晒9你幾年不如早啲夢醒。仲要係數學。

好似Rutger，可能subject rank OK，但其實都係自己班人打飛機，番唔番到香港做AP都成問題。做唔到AP最後又咪係睇general rank搵工 不過都睇你applied math 定咩同埋你點present自己既，識人applied math 然後US都撈得唔錯

rutgers linguistics有幾個大名 （Baker Prince Safir Grimshaw Tesar），其中Prince嘅一篇文（Prince and Smolensky 1993）直情改變咗其中一個subfield嘅paradigm

但係subject rank 151－200

有個frd有alibaba economist既interview question
要下面四題揀一題十日內寫一篇essay
俾你地睇下
Q1. (Monetization Models in a Two-sided Market) e-Commerce platforms differ in their monetization models. Some charge listing fees, others rely primarily on sales commission while a firm like Alibaba derives its revenue from advertising. What are the pros and cons of each approach and what determines the ‘optimal’ monetization model? What are the metrics you would use to judge the effectiveness of a monetization model? Both under- and over-monetization are undesirable.

Q2. (The Optimal Entry Barrier) What is an ‘optimal’ level of entry barrier in an e-commerce market? In a mature e-commerce platform, complaints about information overload and ‘over-competition’ are common. Can there be ‘too many’ sellers? What metrics would you monitor? Suppose that we don’t have sellers’ cost data. Try to answer this question without building a structural model.

Q3. (The Future of Retail) American retail has gone through multiple episodes of drastic change in the past 50 years. Despite the meteoric rise of Amazon, names like Walmart and Costco still hold the top spots in terms of total revenue. Will Amazon over-take Walmart eventually? Why and why not? Please focus on the most important factors to consider. You can also start from a historical perspective.

Q4. (Matching) Matching supply with demand is the ultimate challenge in an e-commerce marketplace. Most websites reply on recommendation algorithms that are variants of the collaborative filtering technique. What are the potential problems with this approach? How to build economic insights into the algorithm to improve its efficiency? Can you derive metrics to monitor the effectiveness of buyer-product matching in an e-commerce environment? Please go beyond simple metrics such as conversion rate and transaction volume.
